properties.name: manualDispatchEnabled
properties.description: Define that the template could be dispatched manually from the API

properties.name: automaticDispatchEnabled
properties.description: Define that the template could be dispatched automatically by the system

properties.description: Define the event that should trigger this notification

properties.description: Define the object that raied the event that should trigger this notification

properties.description: Define the conditions that cause this notification to be triggered

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the access control condition

properties.name: contentParameters
properties.description: Define the content dynamic parameters

properties.name: key
properties.description: The key in the subject and body to be replaced with the dynamic value

properties.name: value
properties.description: The dynamic value to be placed in the final output

properties.name: userParameters
properties.description: Define the content dynamic parameters

properties.name: serverId
properties.description: Define the integrated BPM server id

properties.name: processId
properties.description: Define the integrated BPM process id

properties.name: contentParameters
properties.description: Define the content dynamic parameters

properties.name: key
properties.description: The key in the subject and body to be replaced with the dynamic value

properties.name: value
properties.description: The dynamic value to be placed in the final output

properties.name: userParameters
properties.description: Define the content dynamic parameters

properties.name: format
properties.description: Define the email body format

properties.name: subject
properties.description: Define the email subject

properties.name: body
properties.description: Define the email body content

properties.name: fromEmail
properties.description: Define the email sender email

properties.name: fromName
properties.description: Define the email sender name

properties.name: to
properties.description: Email recipient emails and names

properties.name: cc
properties.description: Email recipient emails and names

properties.name: bcc
properties.description: Email recipient emails and names

properties.name: replyTo
properties.description: Default email addresses to whom the reply should be sent.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: Define the email priority

properties.name: confirmReadingTo
properties.description: Email address that a reading confirmation will be sent

properties.name: hostname
properties.description:
Hostname to use in Message-Id and Received headers and as default HELLO string. 
	 If empty, the value returned by SERVER_NAME is used or 'localhost.localdomain'.

properties.name: messageID
properties.description:
Sets the message ID to be used in the Message-Id header.
	 If empty, a unique id will be generated.

properties.name: customHeaders
properties.description: Adds a e-mail custom header

arrayType.description: A key value pair representation to return an array of key-value pairs (associative array)

properties.name: manualDispatchEnabled
properties.description: Define that the template could be dispatched manually from the API

properties.name: automaticDispatchEnabled
properties.description: Define that the template could be dispatched automatically by the system

properties.name: eventType
properties.description: Define the event that should trigger this notification

properties.description: Define the conditions that cause this notification to be triggered

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the access control condition

properties.name: contentParameters
properties.description: Define the content dynamic parameters

properties.name: key
properties.description: The key in the subject and body to be replaced with the dynamic value

properties.name: value
properties.description: The dynamic value to be placed in the final output

properties.name: userParameters
properties.description: Define the content dynamic parameters

properties.name: url
properties.description: Remote server URL

properties.name: method
properties.description: Request method.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Data to send.

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: The maximum number of seconds to allow cURL functions to execute.

properties.name: connectTimeout
properties.description:
The number of seconds to wait while trying to connect.
	 Must be larger than zero.

properties.name: username
properties.description: A username to use for the connection.

properties.name: password
properties.description: A password to use for the connection.

properties.name: authenticationMethod
properties.description: The HTTP authentication method to use.

properties.name: sslVersion
properties.description:
The SSL version (2 or 3) to use.
	 By default PHP will try to determine this itself, although in some cases this must be set manually.

properties.name: sslCertificate
properties.description: SSL certificate to verify the peer with.

properties.name: sslCertificateType
properties.description: The format of the certificate.

properties.name: sslCertificatePassword
properties.description: The password required to use the certificate.

properties.name: sslEngine
properties.description: The identifier for the crypto engine of the private SSL key specified in ssl key.

properties.name: sslEngineDefault
properties.description: The identifier for the crypto engine used for asymmetric crypto operations.

properties.name: sslKeyType
properties.description: The key type of the private SSL key specified in ssl key - PEM / DER / ENG.

properties.name: sslKey
properties.description: Private SSL key.

properties.name: sslKeyPassword
properties.description: The secret password needed to use the private SSL key specified in ssl key.

properties.name: customHeaders
properties.description: Adds a e-mail custom header

arrayType.description: A key value pair representation to return an array of key-value pairs (associative array)
